All Classes

  • Class Description
    Camera
    Stores the specification of a virtual camera.
    Frustum
    Stores the specification of a viewing frustum, or a viewing volume.
    GLRenderContext
    Implements a RenderContext (a renderer) using OpenGL version 3 (or later).
    GLRenderPanel
    Implementats the RenderPanel interface using OpenGL.
    GLShader
    Manages OpenGL shaders.
    GLTexture
    Manages OpenGL textures.
    GLVertexArrayObject
    A utility class to encapsulate an OpenGL "vertex array object" (VAO).
    GLVertexData
    An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.
    GraphSceneManager  
    Light
    Stores the properties of a light source.
    Light.Type  
    Material
    Stores the properties of a material.
    MeshData
    This class represents a geometric object that is stored in a mesh structure.
    ObjReader
    Reads on .obj file including normals and texture coordinates.
    RenderContext
    Declares the functionality of a render context, or a "renderer".
    RenderItem
    A data structure that contains a reference to a 3D object of class Shape and its transformation Matrix4f.
    RenderPanel
    An interface to display images that are rendered by a render context (a "renderer").
    SceneManagerInterface
    An interface declaration for scene managers.
    SceneManagerIterator
    An iterator to traverse scenes.
    SceneNode  
    Shader
    Declares the functionality to manage shaders.
    Shape
    Represents a 3D object.
    ShapeNode  
    simple
    Implements a simple 3D rendering application using the 3D rendering API provided by the package jrtr.
    simple.SimpleRenderPanel
    An extension of GLRenderPanel or SWRenderPanel to provide a call-back function for initialization.
    SimpleSceneManager
    A simple scene manager that stores objects and lights in linked lists.
    Sphere  
    SWJPanel
    Shows the bitmap rendered by the the software renderer.
    SWRenderContext
    A skeleton for a software renderer.
    SWRenderPanel
    Implements a panel for a software renderer.
    SWShader
    Manages shaders for the software renderer.
    SWTexture
    Manages textures for the software renderer.
    SWVertexData
    A simple implementation of VertexData which does not add any additional functionality.
    Texture
    Declares the functionality to manage textures.
    TransformGroup  
    VertexData
    Provides functionality to specify 3D geometry in the form of triangle meshes.
    VertexData.Semantic
    Vertex data semantic can be position, normal, texture or color coordinates.
